byline.original: By MICHAEL D. SHEAR and NICK CORASANITI

abstract: Viewers of Democratic National Convention will be able to watch event on smartphones and tablets; behind-the-scenes video streaming over social media is produced by in-house unit run by Hillary Clinton's campaign and Democratic National Committee, as part of effort to bypass major news networks and go straight to voters.

headline.print_headline: Live Videos, Small Screens: Campaigns Hope Voters Like What They See
headline.main: Live Videos, Small Screens: Campaigns Hope Voters Like What They See

snippet: Advances in technology have prompted the campaigns to try to bypass major news networks and speak to voters using Facebook Live, Snapchat and other services....
lead_paragraph: Advances in technology have prompted the campaigns to try to bypass major news networks and speak to voters using Facebook Live, Snapchat and other services.
